__e: After the defendant's family was murdered, two men I'd never seen before... they warned me, if I didn't fix the case reports, they'd come after my family next.
I played with the colors and changed the lighting, but I could only make your kids so cute and no cuter.
We had a nice night tonight but actually had a change of plans.
I know you came in last night and edited the Bible from your computer.
I was with him all night, and he never once budged from his story.
Let me put it this way. lt's like he gave you beer-goggle laser surgery.
I made code for the brain that changed the physical body.
There's no telling what it would have done to the future, even the near future.
Well, what if it was modified so it could work from a longer distance?
Well, perhaps it was modified to get here as quickly as possible.
It's like A modified it, so that it could track our every move.
